Reviews.Title: good basic phone
Reviews.Author: Gary Baker
Reviews.Content: all of the basic features, and cheap to buy used, If you can live without a smart phone that is.

Reviews.Title: It is definitely affordable.
Reviews.Author: R. Lee "Gadget lover"
Reviews.Content: I paid only $9.99 for this phone at Radio Shack last year when it was on sale.  This very basic phone is great for people who do not make many calls, do not text much and do not need fancy web connection.  The camera is not good and the complete user manual did not come with the phone.  The phone seems to hold up the charges fairly well and the no-contract service with Verizon is a strong selling point.

Reviews.Title: Cell phone
Reviews.Author: V. DiRago
Reviews.Content: Arrived quickly.  In great shape; works well; just as advertised. Arrived quickly.  In great shape; works well; just as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Good little phone
Reviews.Author: mrs.sparks
Reviews.Content: Great battery life! Takes mini USB charger which is very convenient, I liked that about the phone. The camera isint the best quality but does the job.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Geri A. Redmon
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I expected.  Works perfect.  Arrived in a timely fashion.  I would definitely purchase from this vendor again. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: not at all what was advertised
Reviews.Author: eunice c.
Reviews.Content: the phone it self was nice but was advertised for page plus however it is a verizon prepaid phone and is locked to page plus users

Reviews.Title: Good, reliable phone
Reviews.Author: Niki
Reviews.Content: Good, reliable phone that's doing exactly what I need it to. :)  Definitely no bells or whistles, but fills the niche I need.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Jon
Reviews.Content: As expected worked well. However, if not been used previously for six months, one is not able to use it under a contract. My had already been used so worked out fantastic

Reviews.Title: THIS PHONE CANNOT BE USED FOR ANY CALLS OTHER THAN A PRE-PAID ACCOUNT
Reviews.Author: PL Customer
Reviews.Content: I returned the phone, luckily before opening the packaging because I didn't understand the significance of the term prepaid. I incorrectly assumed that a phone is a phone and that it could be programmed for prepaid or contract usage.  Although Verizon's sales store indicated that it could be programmed for contract usage after they get 6 months of prepaid billing out of the customer. I rely on the Amazon Feedback Community and want to warn everyone that this is a rip off. You can get a prepaid phone at Best Buy for $14.99.

ProductInfo.Features:
Only Works with Verizon Pageplus prepaid plans
Great simple and useful phone interfacce
Includes $10 dollars of Free Airtime!
Sealed and Brand New in case
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Gusto Sch-u360 Prepaid Phone
